Johns_Creek.Wesleyan School: Wesleyan School is an independent K-12 school located 20 miles north of Atlanta in the suburban city of Peachtree Corners, Georgia, United States. It was founded in 1963 and has existed on its current grounds since 1996. The school includes grades K-12 with a total student body of 1148 for the 2016–2017 school year.
